about_the_game:
In this game, you will embark on a journey that blends visual novel storytelling with rich cultural drama. You play as Korn Kachakon, a high school student whose ordinary visit to an art gallery turns extraordinary when he discovers a mysterious painting of an ancient emperor. After a fateful encounter with a guard that leaves him unconscious, Korn's spirit is transported to the mystical realm of "Pralai."

Key Features:

Engaging Storyline: Dive into a captivating narrative that takes you from modern-day life to an ancient kingdom filled with intrigue and adventure.

Cultural Exploration: Immerse yourself in a story that weaves together elements of different cultures, providing a unique and enriching experience.

Interactive Choices: Make critical decisions that will influence the outcome of the story and the fate of the ancient kingdom. Each choice you make can lead to different endings, encouraging multiple playthroughs.

Rich Visuals: Enjoy beautifully crafted artwork that brings both modern and ancient worlds to life, with detailed character designs and vibrant backgrounds.
Character Development: Experience deep character interactions and development as you build relationships and uncover hidden motives of the characters you meet in Pralai.

Will Korn be able to change the fate of the ancient kingdom and find his way back home? The choices are yours to make. Experience the fusion of past and present in this intriguing visual novel adventure.
